text:
Hi Frederick. It’s very tough I know. More so at the moment. Maybe it’s a good time to regroup and have a new start. Take an honest look at your portfolio and how you approach things. It may not be either of those things but it’s good idea to kind of start from scratch if you hit a wall. A creative cold shower. 
I’ll be happy to help out as much as I can.  
Anyway it’s Saturday have a good weekend cheers things over. Imagine Monday is day one. 

Cheers

Jez
